about_the_game:
Uncover ancient secrets and new budding relationships in this romantic fantasy adventure visual novel with a dark twist. Journey with the Galen’s Empire Second Prince and thwart sinister forces that rise from times long since past. With multiple endings and immersive battle sequences, your choices will shape your destiny— or lead you and the Empire down the path of tragedy once again.

STORY
Long ago, the forces of Light triumphed over Darkness. For centuries, the Empire has lived in peace under the protective power of the reigning Galens line. Tales of the Ashen War— an era of vile monsters and the heroes that vanquished them—fell into legend…

Today, you, a bright young scholar, have finally arrived at the Palace to fulfill your lifelong dream—to serve the Imperial Family as the newest advisor to the Second Prince. The future finally looks bright… until the vile creatures of centuries past return.

Thrown into the epicenter of a new epic tale, you and Prince Keldrannon face impossible odds. As ancient forces long thought to be vanquished threaten to raze these peaceful lands, you must work together with the Prince to discover their origins and save the Empire. With each choice you make, the more it is revealed that history may not be what it seems.

How deep does your connection to the Prince run? Unearth the secrets of the past, survive the schemes of the Imperial Court, and earn your right to stand by Keldran's side—and maybe win his heart. Be warned, evil forces are working against you—what’s ‘forgotten’ never stays hidden for long.

Your decisions will shape your shared destiny—and the fate of the continent of Aradal—forever.


FEATURES:
High fantasy immersive story:
Enter the fictional continent of Aradal and discover a world of magic, monsters, and mystery!

Multiple dynamics and outcomes:
The Good, the Bad, and the One True Ending—there are eight total outcomes possible for this magical tale! Every single choice made leads you down a path—this is your story, so you choose how it will end.

Nameable protagonist:
Immerse yourself into the story by giving the protagonist a name of your choosing.

Immersive, RPG-like battles:
Fight alongside the Prince against the forces of darkness! Make the best of your unique skill sets and vanquish enemies in a streamline, turn-based RPG system integrated within the story!

Single, in-depth route:
This game features one romanceable character, but a myriad of ways to tell your love story!

Romantic CGs:
Unlock romantic scenes and beautiful artwork as you get cozier with the Prince!

Replay scenes:
Replay your favorite scenes/voice lines over and over to your heart’s content!

Partial Voice Acting: We have an amazing cast of talented actors all helping to bring our characters to life!
